description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. IncaBlocks is a family board game from 1-4 players.  Place your blocks on the board and be the one with the most blocks on top to win!  Play with or without computer players.
description.short: IncaBlocks is a family board game from 1-4 players.  Place your blocks on the board and be the one with the most blocks on top to win!  Play with or without computer players.
